Title: Detective Byomkesh Bakshy!
Writer: Urmi Juvekar, Dibakar Banerjee, Saradindu Bandopadhyay (based on the stories and characters created by)
Actors: Sushant Singh Rajput, Anand Tiwari, Neeraj Kabi, Divya Menon
Plot: Detective Byomkesh Bakshy is set in the 2nd World War torn Calcutta during the 1940s. Enter a magical world of nostalgia and 'Expect the Unexpected'.
